maape¶

hydrostats.metrics.maape(simulated_array, observed_array, replace_nan=None, replace_inf=None, remove_neg=False, remove_zero=False)[source]¶

Returns the Mean Arctangent Absolute Percentage Error. Range: 0 ≤ MAAPE < π/2, unit less, does not indicate bias, smaller is better. Represents the mean absolute error as a percentage of the observed values. Handles 0s in the observed data. not as bias as MAPE by under-over predictions (Kim and Kim, 2016)

nrmse_iqr

Next topic

d1_p
